translation.en: [narrator] A Mighty Christmas!
translation.vi: A Mighty Christmas.

translation.en: [Nico] Christmas is tonight! All we need is snow!
translation.vi: Christmas is tonight! All we need is snow!

translation.en: And there. Hmm.
translation.vi: And there!

translation.en: Is it Christmas yet? Huh? Huh? Huh?
translation.vi: Is it Christmas yet? Huh?

translation.en: Almost, Flicker! Pretty soon the whole town will be here
translation.vi: Almost, Flicker! Soon, the whole town will be here for the big Christmas party.

translation.en: for the big Christmas party.
translation.vi: Soon, the whole town will be here for the big Christmas party.

translation.en: Oops! Sorry, Nico! I'm just so excited for Christmas!
translation.vi: Sorry, Nico. I'm just so excited for Christmas.

translation.en: Me, too!
translation.vi: Me too!

translation.en: Whoa! Looking Christmassy, Nico!
translation.vi: Looking Christmassy, Nico.

translation.en: Nice job, everyone. Now let's set up the spot for the Christmas tree.
translation.vi: Nice job. Let's set up the spot for the Christmas tree.

translation.en: Allow me to introduce myself.
translation.vi: Allow me to introduce myself. I'm Mandy Mail,

translation.en: I'm Mandy Mail, the best mail delivery train in town!
translation.vi: Allow me to introduce myself. I'm Mandy Mail, the best mail delivery train in town! Need anything delivered, I'm your train.

translation.en: If you need anything delivered, I'm your train!
translation.vi: the best mail delivery train in town! Need anything delivered, I'm your train.

translation.en: And this is her mail carrier pigeon friend, Flap!
translation.vi: This is her mail carrier pigeon friend, Flap.

translation.en: [all] Hiya! Welcome to the team!
translation.vi: Hiya! Welcome to the team!

translation.en: -[comm alert] -Carrie to Max!
translation.vi: Carrie to Max.

translation.en: I need help with a delivery at Mail Station. Could you send a train?
translation.vi: I need help with a delivery. Could you send a train?

translation.en: Dear Santa, for Christmas
translation.vi: "Dear Santa, for Christmas,

translation.en: I would love a special delivery of an orange-and-green soccer ball.
translation.vi: I would love a special delivery of an orange-and-green football."

translation.en: That would be first class.
translation.vi: "That would be first class! Love, Carrie."

translation.en: Love, Carrie. Signed and sealed!
translation.vi: "That would be first class! Love, Carrie." Signed and sealed.

translation.en: Now to deliver all of these letters to Santa at the North Pole.
translation.vi: Now to deliver all these letters to Santa at the North Pole.

translation.en: Hi! You must be Carrie!
translation.vi: Hi, you must be Carrie.

translation.en: You must be Mandy Mail. I'm so glad you're here!
translation.vi: You must be Mandy Mail. I'm so glad you're here.

translation.en: Well, I am the best.
translation.vi: Well, I am the best!

translation.en: So where's this super-special, extra-important delivery you've got for me?
translation.vi: So, where's this super-special, extra-important delivery you've got?

translation.en: Mail?! [scoffs] I mean, I've delivered mail before.
translation.vi: Mail? I mean, I've delivered mail before.

translation.en: Oh! Every letter is important, especially...
translation.vi: Oh, every letter is important, especially…

translation.en: Uh-oh! Another delivery! Gotta go! Thanks, Mandy!
translation.vi: Another delivery! Gotta go! Thanks, Mandy!

translation.en: So much for something super special and extra important.
translation.vi: So much for something super-special and extra-important.

translation.en: [gasps] The town Christmas tree!
translation.vi: The town Christmas tree!

translation.en: Now that is an important delivery! Perfect for me!
translation.vi: Now that is an important delivery. Perfect for me!

translation.en: I mean, for us. Make way for Mandy Mail!
translation.vi: I mean for us. Make way for Mandy Mail!

translation.en: Great decorating, everyone! OK, let's light this tree up.
translation.vi: Great decorating, everyone. Okay, let's light this tree up.

translation.en: Making the switch!
translation.vi: Making the switch.

translation.en: Wow! It's beautiful! And I'm the one who delivered it!
translation.vi: -Wow, it's beautiful. -And I'm the one who delivered it.

translation.en: And now it's almost time for the best part of Christmas!
translation.vi: It's almost time for the best part of Christmas!

translation.en: No. The big town party!
translation.vi: No, the big town party!

translation.en: And then... Santa comes!
translation.vi: And then, Santa comes!

translation.en: I sent a letter to Santa asking for a new bike.
translation.vi: I sent a letter to Santa asking for a new bike!

translation.en: Um, why does Diesel have my letter?
translation.vi: Why does Diesel have my letter?

translation.en: Uh, Mandy? Weren't you supposed to deliver these letters to Santa?
translation.vi: Mandy, weren't you supposed to deliver those letters to Santa?
I…

translation.en: If Santa doesn't get our letters, the kids in Tracksville won't get presents!
translation.vi: If Santa doesn't get our letters, the Tracksville kids won't get presents!

translation.en: We have to get these letters to the North Pole right away!
translation.vi: We have to get these letters to the North Pole! Calling all trains.

translation.en: Calling all trains! Please report to the Busy Board for today's Mega Mission!
translation.vi: We have to get these letters to the North Pole! Calling all trains. Please report to the Busy Board for today's Mega Mission!

translation.en: It's Mighty Time!
translation.vi: It's Mighty time!

translation.en: Today's Mega Mission goes to...
translation.vi: Today's Mega Mission goes to…

translation.en: What? Really?!
translation.vi: What? Really?

translation.en: Everybody deserves a second chance. Delivering mail is what you do best, Mandy.
translation.vi: Everybody deserves a second chance. Delivering mail is what you do best.

translation.en: You'll go back and pick up the letters to Santa at Mail Station,
translation.vi: Go and pick up the letters to Santa at Mail Station.

translation.en: then deliver them to the North Pole as fast as you can!
translation.vi: Deliver them to the North Pole as fast as you can!

translation.en: Mandy Mail never fails!
translation.vi: Deliver them to the North Pole as fast as you can! Mandy Mail never fails!

translation.en: I guess delivering the letters to Santa is super special and extra important.
translation.vi: I guess delivering letters to Santa is super-special and extra-important.

translation.en: Mandy, it's time to...
translation.vi: Mandy, it's time to…

translation.vi: It's time to clean up

translation.vi: It's time to tune up

translation.vi: Mighty Express

translation.en: Check! Check! Checkity-check-check!
translation.vi: Check, check. Checkity-check-check.

translation.en: And... you are Liza-certified!
translation.vi: And… you are Liza-certified!

translation.en: And now it's time to hook up with the mail carrier car!
translation.vi: And now it's time to hook up with the mail carrier car.

translation.en: All right, Mandy. Get the letters to Santa and save Christmas!
translation.vi: All right, Mandy, get the letters to Santa and save Christmas.

translation.en: Now you're ready to...
translation.vi: Now, you're ready to…

translation.en: [all] Make tracks!
translation.vi: Make tracks!

translation.en: [grunts] I don't know if all these letters will fit! I think you need another train to help you.
translation.vi: I don't know if these letters will fit. I think you need another train to help.

translation.en: Help? No, no, no, no, no! I can save Christmas all on my own!
translation.vi: Help? No. I can save Christmas all on my own.

translation.en: Hi, Max! We need another train to help us cos there's a lot of mail here.
translation.vi: Hi, Max. We need another train to help, there's a lot of mail here.

translation.en: And Nico will come too, in case there are any problems with the track.
translation.vi: Nico will come too, in case of problems with the track.

translation.en: Come on... Close!
translation.vi: Come on! Close!

translation.en: See? There! Don't need any help. Bye!
translation.vi: See? There. Don't need any help. Bye!

translation.en: But Mandy already left and she has too much mail to carry by herself!
translation.vi: But Mandy left. She has too much mail to carry by herself.

translation.en: Oh, no! This is a Christmas calamity!
translation.vi: Oh no! This is a Christmas calamity!

translation.en: Let's catch up to Mandy and help!
translation.vi: Let's catch up to Mandy and help.

translation.en: Come in, Mandy. Nate and Nico are on their way to help!
translation.vi: Come in, Mandy. Nate and Nico are on their way to help.

translation.en: No, no, no. I'm good. I can do it by myself!
translation.vi: No, I'm good. I can do it by myself.

translation.en: I'm going to be the one
translation.vi: I'm gonna be the one

translation.en: to save the super-special, extra-important Christmas delivery.
translation.vi: to save this super-special, extra-important Christmas delivery.

translation.en: Whew! It's getting chilly! I'd better go faster to warm us up.
translation.vi: It's getting chilly. I'd better go faster to warm us up!

translation.en: [both] Mandy! Slow down!
translation.vi: Mandy! Slow down!

translation.en: I never thought I'd say this, but I need...
translation.vi: I never thought I'd say this, but I… need… help!

translation.en: -Help! -[Flap squawks]
translation.vi: but I… need… help!

translation.en: Don't worry, Mandy, we'll save you! [Mandy] Hurry!
translation.vi: -Don't worry, Mandy, we'll save you! -Hurry!

translation.en: Mega grappling claw, activate!
translation.vi: Mega-grappling claw, activate!

translation.en: Mega-stabiliser legs, activate!
translation.vi: Mega-stabilizer legs, activate!

translation.en: Careful, Nate. According to my calculations, the ice we're on might...
translation.vi: Careful. According to my calculations, the ice we're on might…

translation.en: Thanks for helping me!
translation.vi: Thanks for helping me.

translation.en: Oh, no! I'm sorry. You know what? I could use a little help with this delivery.
translation.vi: Oh no! I'm sorry. You know what? I could use help with this delivery.

translation.en: Happy to be of service! Let's get these letters to Santa!
translation.vi: -Happy to be of service. -Let's get the letters to Santa!

translation.en: Wow, look! Santa's Workshop!
translation.vi: Wow, look! Santa's workshop!

translation.en: Ho, ho, ho! Hello, Nico, Mandy, Flap and Nate!
translation.vi: Hello, Nico, Mandy, Flap, and Nate.

translation.en: We've got a special delivery for you, Santa.
translation.vi: -We've got a special delivery for you. -Thanks to some help from Nate.

translation.en: Thanks to some help from Nate, done and delivered!
translation.vi: -We've got a special delivery for you. -Thanks to some help from Nate. -Done… -…and delivered.

translation.en: Letters from the kids in Tracksville telling you what they'd like for Christmas!
translation.vi: Letters saying what Tracksville kids want for Christmas.

translation.en: Is that a good "hmm" or a bad "hmm?" Well, I'm afraid it's not good.
translation.vi: -Is that a good "hmm" or a bad "hmm"? -Well, I'm afraid it's not good.

translation.en: It's too late to make any more presents. It's time to make our deliveries!
translation.vi: It's too late to make any more presents. It's time to make our deliveries.

translation.en: And there's a storm brewing!
translation.vi: And there's a storm brewing.

translation.en: We need to head out soon or we'll get caught in it!
translation.vi: We need to head out soon, or we'll get caught in it.

translation.en: But we came all this way! And the kids worked so hard on their letters!
translation.vi: But we came all this way. The kids worked so hard on their letters.

translation.en: Yeah. Like getting together with your family and friends.
translation.vi: Like getting together with family and friends.

translation.en: Friends! That's it! What if we got our friends to come and help make presents for the kids?
translation.vi: Friends! That's it! What if our friends come to help make presents?

translation.en: Well, we do have a little time. With some help, we could make the toys we need.
translation.vi: Well, we do have a little time. With help, we could make the toys we need.

translation.en: Ha! Even Santa needs a little extra help sometimes. Ho, ho, ho!
translation.vi: Even Santa needs a little extra help sometimes.

translation.en: OK, Mandy to Max. Come in, Max!
translation.vi: Okay. Mandy to Max. Come in, Max.

translation.en: There you are! Are you all right?
translation.vi: -There you are! -Are you all right?

translation.en: Yup! We got to the North Pole, but we've got a lot of presents to make.
translation.vi: Yep! We got to the North Pole. But we've got a lot of presents to make.

translation.en: According to my calculations, it's gonna take a really long time! We need your help!
translation.vi: According to my calculations, it'll take a long time. We need help.

translation.en: We're on our way with Brock, Milo and Flicker.
translation.vi: We're on our way with Brock, Milo, and Flicker.

translation.en: Ho, ho, ho! This is where we make all the toys!
translation.vi: This is where we make all the toys.

translation.en: This place is amazing!
translation.vi: This place is amazing.

translation.en: Thanks! I designed it myself. Tinsel-tastic, isn't it?!
translation.vi: Thanks. I designed it myself. Tinsel-tastic, isn't it?

translation.en: I hope help gets here soon!
translation.vi: I hope help gets here soon.

translation.en: -Ho, ho, ho! Hello! -Thanks for coming.
translation.vi: -Hello! -Thanks for coming.

translation.en: Oh, my gosh, oh, my gosh, oh, my gosh! Santa! I'm a big fan!
translation.vi: Oh my gosh! Santa! I'm a big fan!

translation.en: It's good to see you, too, Milo! I'm so glad you're all here!
translation.vi: Good to see you too, Milo. I'm so glad you're all here.

translation.en: We have to hurry if we want to finish the toys before the storm hits!
translation.vi: We have to hurry if we want to finish the toys before the storm.

translation.en: Mandy, you're in charge of wrapping the gifts. We brought your wrapping car.
translation.vi: You're in charge of wrapping the gifts. We brought your wrapping car.

translation.en: Wrapping?! But what about making toys? I thought I'd get an important job.
translation.vi: What about making toys? I thought I'd get an important job.

translation.en: You know, Mandy, when you're part of a team, every job is important.
translation.vi: Mandy, when you're part of a team, every job is important.

translation.en: All right, Santa. Then I'll be the best gift-wrapper who ever wrapped!
translation.vi: Then I'll be the best gift wrapper who ever wrapped.

translation.en: I'll be a wrap star! [chuckles]
translation.vi: I'll be a "wrap star."

translation.en: That's the spirit! Now let's ho, ho, go!
translation.vi: That's the spirit. Now, let's ho-ho-go before that storm gets here.

translation.en: Before that storm gets here!
translation.vi: Now, let's ho-ho-go before that storm gets here.

translation.vi: Happy holidays from Tracksville Mighty Express

translation.en: And that's a wrap on wrapping! [chuckles]
translation.vi: And that's a wrap on wrapping.

translation.en: Ho, ho, ho! Jolly good work!
translation.vi: Jolly good work.

translation.en: -[comms alert] -[Jubilee] Max!
translation.vi: Come in, Max.

translation.en: Everything's set up for the party. How's it going at the North Pole?
translation.vi: Everything's set up for the party. How's it going?

translation.en: We finished making the presents. Now we just have to deliver them.
translation.vi: We finished the presents. We have to deliver them.

translation.en: Great! See you soon! Over and out.
translation.vi: Great. See you soon. Over and out.

translation.en: [Santa] I don't like the look of those clouds.
translation.vi: I don't like the look of those clouds.

translation.en: Let's load up the sleigh so I can ho, ho, go before the storm hits.
translation.vi: Let's load the sleigh so I can ho-ho-go before the storm hits.

translation.en: That's all the presents! Checkity-check! Let's hook up the reindeer!
translation.vi: -That's all the presents. Check! -Let's hook up the reindeer.

translation.en: Oh, no! The reindeer can't take off in this weather.
translation.vi: Oh no! The reindeer can't take off in this weather.

translation.en: I'm afraid not, Brock. If the reindeer can't pull the sleigh then...
translation.vi: I'm afraid not, Brock. If the reindeer can't pull the sleigh, then…

translation.en: Uh, I mean... we can do it!
translation.vi: I mean, we can do it.

translation.en: We're made of metal and strong enough to get through all that ice and wind!
translation.vi: We're metal and strong enough to get through ice and wind.

translation.en: Let's haul, y'all! Rescue Red to the rescue!
translation.vi: -Let's haul, y'all! -Rescue Red to the rescue!

translation.en: This is so exciting!
translation.vi: This is so exciting.

translation.en: Ho, ho, ho! Thanks for your help, everyone. OK, Nico, where to first?
translation.vi: Thanks for your help, everyone. Okay, Nico, where to first?

translation.en: Our first delivery is to Bat Cave Tunnel to deliver these hats.
translation.vi: Our first delivery is to Bat Cave Tunnel to deliver these hats.-

translation.en: Then on, Red! On, Flicker! On, Penny!
translation.vi: Then, on Red, on Flicker, on Penny, on Milo, on Mandy, on Brock,

translation.en: On, Milo! On, Mandy! On, Brock!
translation.vi: on Penny, on Milo, on Mandy, on Brock,

translation.en: On, Nate! And on, Faye!
translation.vi: on Nate, and on Faye!

translation.en: And away we go! Ho, ho, ho!
translation.vi: And away we go!

translation.en: [Jubilee] Come in, Max.
translation.vi: Come in, Max.

translation.en: It's almost time for the Christmas party to start. How's it going?
translation.vi: It's almost time for the party. How's it going?

translation.en: Well, we made it through the worst of the storm but now we have to make the deliveries.
translation.vi: We made it through the storm, now we have to make the deliveries.

translation.en: And then we'll get there as fast as we can! OK! See you soon! Over and out.
translation.vi: -Then we'll get there as fast as we can. -Okay, see you soon! Over and out.

translation.en: [Max] Bat Cave Tunnel straight ahead. Let's ho, ho, go!
translation.vi: -Bat Cave Tunnel, straight ahead. -Let's ho-ho-go!

translation.en: Merry Christmas, my bat friends! Ho, ho, ho, ho!
translation.vi: Merry Christmas, my bat friends!

translation.en: -Here you go! -Here you go! -There you are! -Come and get 'em!
translation.vi: -Here you go! -Come and get 'em!

translation.en: -[Liza] Here you go! -[Max] Here you are!
translation.vi: -Here you go. -Here you are.

translation.en: That'll keep 'em warm. Now, let's deliver the rest of these presents.
translation.vi: That'll keep them warm. Now, let's deliver these presents.

translation.en: Oh, no! The storm got even worse!
translation.vi: Oh no! The storm got even worse!

translation.en: But we have to get these presents to the kids!
translation.vi: But we have to get these presents to the kids.

translation.en: It's OK, Flap. There's gotta be another way out of here.
translation.vi: It's okay, Flap. There's got to be another way out.

translation.en: [gasps] Look! Up there!
translation.vi: Look! Up there!

translation.en: Yeah! But, uh, we'd have to fly!
translation.vi: Yeah! But we'd have to fly.

translation.en: [gasps] Excellent idea, Penny!
translation.vi: Excellent idea, Penny.

translation.en: Um, Santa? According to my calculations, trains can't fly.
translation.vi: Santa? According to my calculations, trains can't fly.

translation.en: Let's see about that. Ho, ho, ho!
translation.vi: Let's see about that.

translation.en: I can use the same magic that makes my reindeer fly.
translation.vi: I can use the magic that makes my reindeer fly.

translation.en: I'm not sure it'll work on trains, but I ho-ho-hope it does!
translation.vi: I'm not sure it'll work on trains, but I ho-ho-hope it does.

translation.en: -Me, me, me! -All right, Mandy.
translation.vi: -Me! -All right, Mandy.

translation.en: Now, get ready to... fly!
translation.vi: Now, get ready to fly!

translation.en: I'm flying?! Yippee!
translation.vi: I'm flying?

translation.en: All right! Ho, ho, ho! Who's next?!
translation.vi: All right! Who's next?

translation.en: [all] Me! Me! Me!
translation.vi: -Me, please, Santa! -Me!

translation.en: Well, it's getting late. I guess we'll just have to start the Christmas party without everyone.
translation.vi: It's getting late. We'll have to start the party without everyone.

translation.en: I hear trains! But where are they?
translation.vi: I hear trains, but where are they?

translation.en: -All right! -Hooray!
translation.vi: -All right! -Ho-ho-hooray!

translation.en: [gasps] Santa?
translation.vi: Santa?

translation.en: Sorry we're late, Jubilee. I'm just glad you made it!
translation.vi: -Sorry we're late. -I'm just glad you made it.

translation.en: The Christmas party wouldn't have been the same without you.
translation.vi: The party wouldn't have been the same without you.

translation.en: Ho, ho, ho! Merry Christmas!
translation.vi: Merry Christmas!

translation.en: -Snow, snow, snow! -It's snowing!
translation.vi: -Snow! -It's snowing!
